name: Daydream at Dusk
description:
Daydream at Dusk is the result of a four week collaboration between Jesse Linards (Game Dev), Kevin Barber (Audio Design) and Riley Lollback (Game Dev)

We tried to create an audio-visual experience that was reminiscent of childhood fantasies and did our best to merge the music and the gameplay into one.

Sit back and relax or use Space to jump and play with the hypnotic landscape and get to new heights of the level. Hope you enjoy it!
